content:
Here are some interesting facts about these products:

1. Mayonnaise Sachets:
* Perfect for adding a creamy texture and tangy flavour to sandwiches and salads.
* Convenient single-serve sachets ensure portion control and reduce waste.
* Made with free-range eggs and high-quality ingredients.
1. Brown Sauce Sachets:
* A classic condiment with a sweet and tangy flavour, perfect for breakfast items like bacon sandwiches.
* Convenient single-serve sachets are great for takeaways and catering events.
* Contains a blend of spices, molasses, and tamarind for a unique flavour.
1. Salad Cream Sachets:
* A versatile and creamy sauce that can be used as a dressing or a dip.
* Single-serve sachets ensure freshness and reduce waste.
* Made with free-range eggs and natural ingredients.
1. Tartare Sauce Sachets:
* A classic sauce made with mayonnaise, gherkins, capers, and herbs, perfect for pairing with fish and seafood.
* Convenient single-serve sachets are great for takeaways and catering events.
* Made with high-quality ingredients and free-range eggs.
1. Vinegar Sachets:
* Perfect for adding a tangy flavour to fish and chips or salads.
* Convenient single-serve sachets ensure portion control and reduce waste.
* Made with high-quality vinegar and free from artificial colours and preservatives.
1. English Mustard Sachets:
* A hot and tangy mustard that pairs well with meat and sandwiches.
* Convenient single-serve sachets ensure freshness and reduce waste.
* Made with a blend of mustard flour, water, salt, and spices.
1. Cheese & Onion Slices:
* A tasty vegetarian option for sandwiches and buffets.
* Made with mature cheddar cheese and onions for a flavourful filling.
* Suitable for freezing, making it convenient for meal prep or catering events.
1. White Chocolate & Winter Spice Cake:
* A festive treat made with white chocolate chunks and warm winter spices.
* Perfect for enjoying with a cup of tea or coffee during the winter months.
* Made with high-quality ingredients and free-range eggs.
